name: Markov
description: A simple name generator that uses markov chainsTo use enter !markov in the chat and a new name will be generated using a markov chain. See the READ.me for more details.
authors: Ryan Jentzsch (retooled into Roll20 -- based on works created by drow <drow@bin.sh> and released into the public domain)

useroptions.name: Search Handouts
useroptions.description: Clear this checkbox if you DON'T have handouts to be included as Markov language sets.
